signals: The website uses English language and mentions EU data privacy regulations.

proof: Use of cookies for functionality and user experience

facts.text: Frontify is a brand management software.
facts.evidence: Frontify: Where Brands Live - Brand Management Software

facts.text: The website uses cookies to improve functionality and user experience.
facts.evidence: We use cookies to improve the functionality of our website and provide you with the best user experience.

facts.text: Users can accept or deny the use of cookies on the website.
facts.evidence: You can accept or deny the use of cookies, as well as adjust your cookie preferences using the toggles below.

facts.text: The website provides a Cookie Policy for more information.
facts.evidence: For more information about our use of cookies, please see our Cookie Policy.

facts.text: Necessary cookies help make a website usable by enabling basic functions like page navigation.
facts.evidence: Necessary cookies help make a website usable by enabling basic functions like page navigation and access to secure areas of the website.

facts.text: The website uses Cloudflare for distinguishing between humans and bots.
facts.evidence: Cloudflare 1: This cookie is used to distinguish between humans and bots.

facts.text: Cookiebot is used to count the number of sessions to the website.
facts.evidence: Cookiebot 1: Used to count the number of sessions to the website, necessary for optimizing CMP product delivery.

facts.text: Embed.ly is necessary for the login function on the website.
facts.evidence: Embed.ly 2: This cookie is necessary for the login function on the website.

facts.text: Google collects data for personalization and measuring advertising effectiveness.
facts.evidence: Google 1: Some of the data collected by this provider is for the purposes of personalization and measuring advertising effectiveness.

facts.text: LinkedIn cookies are used to detect spam and improve website security.
facts.evidence: LinkedIn 2: Used in order to detect spam and improve the website's security.

facts.text: Pinterest determines whether the user is located within the EU for data privacy regulations.
facts.evidence: Pinterest 1: Determines whether the user is located within the EU and therefore is subject to EU's data privacy regulations.

facts.text: Typeform cookies are used to contain user’s survey and quiz answers.
facts.evidence: Typeform 8: Used to contain user’s survey and quiz answers in Local Storage.

facts.text: The website uses load balancing to optimize user experience.
facts.evidence: AWSALBTG: Registers which server-cluster is serving the visitor. This is used in context with load balancing, in order to optimize user experience.

facts.text: The website uses cookies to detect errors and optimize visitor experience.
facts.evidence: debug: This cookie is used to detect errors on the website - this information is sent to the website's support staff in order to optimize the visitor's experience on the website.

facts.text: The website uses Cloudflare services for load-balancing and DNS connection.
facts.evidence: _cfuvid: This cookie is a part of the services provided by Cloudflare - Including load-balancing, deliverance of website content and serving DNS connection for website operators.
